title: Data & Visual Analytics
description: Introduction to the analysis of complex data; theory, applications and practical case studies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 2028 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1372 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2316 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CX 4010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CX 4240 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
